tr.title: Sun Apr 19 2020, 5:26 pm DRIVE-UPS WILL NOT BE SERVED AT THE TRAILER PARKS OR WOODRIDGE. DRIVE-UPS WILL ONLY BE SERVED AT THE SCHOOL.
tr.td: DRIVE-UPS WILL NOT BE SERVED AT THE TRAILER PARKS OR WOODRIDGE. DRIVE-UPS WILL ONLY BE SERVED AT THE SCHOOL.

tr.title: Sun Apr 19 2020, 5:25 pm We will also be serving meals at Hoppe’s Trailer Park, Shady Oaks and Woodridge. Meals will be delivered starting at 10:00 a.m.
tr.td: We will also be serving meals at Hoppe’s Trailer Park, Shady Oaks and Woodridge. Meals will be delivered starting at 10:00 a.m.

tr.title: Sun Apr 19 2020, 5:23 pm CHILDREN MUST BE PRESENT TO RECEIVE MEALS. For safety, meals will be into the trunk or back of vehicles only.
tr.td: CHILDREN MUST BE PRESENT TO RECEIVE MEALS. For safety, meals will be into the trunk or back of vehicles only.

tr.title: Sun Apr 19 2020, 5:21 pm Latta School will be serving a week’s worth of meals tomorrow to children 18 & under. Meals will be served from 11:30 to 1:00.
tr.td: Latta School will be serving a week’s worth of meals tomorrow to children 18 & under. Meals will be served from 11:30 to 1:00.

div.p:
The Indian Ed Parent Comm. Meeting and Title VI public hearing scheduled for Wed. April 22 at 5:30 pm has been rescheduled for Wed. May 6 at 5:30 pm.
For information on Latta distance learning plan, see video message from Mrs. Lancaster on school Facebook page and website. For additional questions, email teachers or bldg principal
Students/Parents: For information on Latta?s district-wide distance learning plan, see video message from Mrs. Lancaster posted on school FB page & website. Students in grades 5-12 using Google Classroom need to make sure notifications are turned on.
We have been approved to deliver meals for children. Please check COVID-19 (located in Quick Links) for more . . .

Latta Pre-Kindergarten is seeking information that will help with the 2020-2021 enrollment.
The parents of students wishing to attend Latta’s Pre-Kindergarten and live in the Latta School district need to call the elementary office by April 27th . Please contact us at (580)332-2092 and speak with Mrs. Kessinger or Mrs. Lancaster.
Congratulations District Vocal Music Students: Bailey Howe and Elizabeth Crawford --Superior on their vocal solos and advance to OSSAA State. Middle School-- Aspen Fullerton , Emma Skinner and Lucy Shires --Superior rating for their Trio.
Congratulations to DECA State Winners: the following students were finalist. Ryler Rich won the DECA . . .

LATTA PUBLIC SCHOOLS
MISSION STATEMENT
Latta Public Schools will provide the opportunity for a challenging and relevant educational experience that will empower students to be productive, confident, and successful citizens.
Core Values
Integrity —a reflection of high moral character within oneself
Honor —a dedication to the principles of right and wrong within one’s family, school, and community
Dependability —being faithful to one’s word
Commitment —a pledge to do one’s best in all circumstances
Accountability —accepting responsibility for actions that affect oneself and others . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Latta Mission Statement
